snippet: The bad air, the unsafe food, the high-pressure schools - they have worn out two prominent expatriates, a dissident artist and increasing numbers of the Chinese elite. Daily life for many in China's proliferating mega-cities is getting ever more...
abstract: The bad air, the unsafe food, the high-pressure schools - they have worn out two prominent expatriates, a dissident artist and increasing numbers of the Chinese elite. Daily life for many in China's proliferating mega-cities is getting ever more unhealthy and increasingly unbearable.

headline.main: Heading for the Exits in China
